posts.message: RT @jimwooley: Want to try out the new #Roslyn Compiler? head over to http://t.co/xOx55ysdVt to get the install package. #bldwin #Build2014
posts.caption: msdn.microsoft.com
posts.description: The .NET Compiler Platform ("Roslyn") provides open-source C# and Visual Basic compilers with rich code analysis APIs. You can build code analysis tools with the same APIs that Microsoft is using to implement Visual Studio!

posts.message:
Google Chrome Blink

RT @Meligy: RT @GregSimon_: Blink is one year old! How far we've come in only one year http://t.co/HNmARaXVsJ
posts.caption: blog.chromium.org
posts.description: Last April we introduced Blink as the new rendering engine for Chromium. Since then, the project has grown to include over 200 active contributors, and code complexity has been reduced significantly. We’ve also made encouraging progress on our top priority for 2014: mobile web performance. A product...

posts.caption: dailyjs.com
posts.description: WinJS (GitHub: winjs / winjs, License: Apache 2.0) is a new UI-oriented library from Microsoft for developing cross-platform applications with JavaScript.

posts.message: RT @mattchenderson: After that awesome demo by @theyavor, you're probably ready to start with AAD and @AzureMobile .NET. Here's how http://t.co/Kpo9qy0Duu
posts.caption: www.windowsazure.com
posts.description: Windows Azure is an open and flexible cloud platform that enables you to quickly build, deploy and manage applications across a global network of Microsoft-managed data center
